sys_user_role.description:
Role that can be assigned to trainers and users with elivated previledges. Supervisours can assign or unassign items obo other users
SAP Def: Supervisors: If you authorize to the web service as a user who is a learning manager, your client can enable supervisors to add/remove assignments. A supervisor user ID is one that appears on another users' record in the summary section as the supervisor. Users can also have alternate supervisors defined. When a supervisor assigns learning, he or she assigns from their supervisor's catalog and not the users' catalogs. Put another way, a supervisor might have access to learning items or programs that employees do not.
sys_user_role.name: x_thjuh_lms.supervisor
